subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text: Found in the historical {{w|Zhengzitong}} 《{{w2|zh|正字通}}》 dictionary published during the {{w|Qing dynasty}} (1671 AD).

subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text: Found in the 1956 first round revision table of variant Chinese characters ({{w2|zh|第一批异体字整理表}}) by the People's Republic of China, where {{l|zh|䥥}} and {{l|zh|鎌}} were listed as {{w|Variant Chinese characters|variant forms}} of {{l|zh|鐮}}. <!-- Refer https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/第一批异体字整理表/1955年 -->

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text: {{zh-see|鐮|v}} <!-- Note: "v" parameter is needed here because alt-form of 鐮 refers to etymology 2 of 䥥 -->
